summary: Completed comprehensive testing of workout templates feature - all functionality working correctly

flaky_endpoints.workaround: Not related to templates feature, existing issue

passed_tests: Templates page loads correctly at /templates
Create template modal opens and functions properly
Template creation with name, description, and exercises
Exercise search and selection in template creation
Template appears in templates list after creation
Template edit functionality - name and description updates
Template delete functionality with confirmation dialog
Empty state display when no templates exist
Load Template button appears in Log Workout when templates exist
Load Template button hidden when no templates exist
Template selection modal in Log Workout
Loading template pre-fills exercises in workout
Template loading shows correct exercise count and names
Toast notifications for template operations
Backend API: GET /api/templates returns templates
Backend API: POST /api/templates creates template
Backend API: GET /api/templates/{id} retrieves specific template
Backend API: PUT /api/templates/{id} updates template
Backend API: DELETE /api/templates/{id} deletes template
Template data structure validation
Exercise filtering and search in template creation
Template CRUD operations end-to-end
